content: Try to run Thunderbird in troubleshoot mode: Win >> hold down the Shift key while launching TB Mac >> hold down the Alt (Option) key while launching TB
creator: Mapenzi

content: Depending on how you deleted the account, the message folders may still be there. - click help>troubleshootinginformation - scroll to 'profile folder' and click 'open folder' - you are now in the profile. - if the account was IMAP, open the imapmail folder. if POP, then open the mail folder - if your account is shown, then click the account name and your message folders, such as inbox, inbox.msf will appear. - if that is true, let me know and I'll provide next steps.
creator: davidsk

content:
Policies are not a common strength here, but I do have a few links that may prove helpful:

https://enterprise.thunderbird.net/manage-updates-policies-and-customization https://thunderbird.github.io/policy-templates/ https://github.com/thunderbird/policy-templates https://enterprise.thunderbird.net/manage-updates-policies-and-customization/managing-thunderbird-policies/customizing-thunderbird-using-policies.json
creator: davidsk

content:
I suppose that you had used POP accounts in Thunderbird on your old laptop, so Thunderbird on your new laptop can only download the incoming messages which had been left on the server. Since you have professional use of Thunderbird I presume that you regularly made security backups of your Thunderbird profile containing all your data (accounts, folders, messages, address books, ...). Would you like to recover your data from the most recent backup copy?

If you don't have backup copies of your Thunderbird data, try to get help from an IT professional who might recover the hard disk of your old laptop, mount it in a drive and plug it in your laptop.
creator: Mapenzi

content: È un errore lato server, devi contattare il gestore della casella email. L'errore è un po' criptico, ma parrebbe tu abbia violato qualche regole del provider.
creator: @next

content: I am unsure of the problem. Usually, links are to graphics, not to text. Try checking that settings>privacy&security has the remote content option checked.
